True, but I dissagree with both sides of the issue. Even though their 
organic muscles would grow after training, I don't think it'd make 
much difference over their much-stronger mechanical structure. It 
makes sense that metallic stuff would be stronger than notmal organic 
muscles.

However, Transformers are sentient beings, and as so, can learn. So, 
in effect, training would allow them to learn new techniques, change 
old ones, etc. And if they were training with other bots, they'd 
learn their tactics, and become better at fighting. See what I mean?




--- In nbwrpg@y..., kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  OCC: DONT FORGET THEY ALSO ARE ORGANIC. DONT YOUR MUSCELES GROW 
AFTER YOU 
> TRAIN OR WORK OUT. ITS THE SAME THING. THEY ARE PARTLY ORGANIC AND 
THATS 
> WHATS BEING IMPROVED.
